results.name: a(n) is the sum of divisors of n, minus the largest square dividing that sum, minus n: a(n) = sigma(n) - A008833(sigma(n)) - n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000

formula: a(n) = A326040(n) - n = sigma(n) - A008833(sigma(n)) - n.
